name: Goalkeeper Goats
description:
Flying farting goats playing soccer.

2 players locally, or 1 player vs AI.

Default controls player one:

  •  move left: keyboard A (or first gamepad joystick left)
  • move right: keyboard D (or first gamepad joystick right)
  • jump & fart: keyboard spacebar (or first gamepad primary button)

Default controls player two:

  • move left: keyboard ←
  • move right: keyboard →
  • jump & fart: keyboard numpad zero

Upcoming features still in development:

  • 4 player mode
  • better AI
  • "offscreen" indicators and/or a minimap
